task.title: Use Grip Stretch Function on Dynamic Blocks
task.shortdesc: Once you have selected a dynamic block contains stretch action, click the light blue grip on the dynamic block to display command line prompt as follows:

context.p: Under the prompt, you can specify a new position on the drawing area where the grip is expected to be stretched. Move the selected grip to the new position to stretch the object.
Stretch dynamic block by using grip

step.cmd: Select the dynamic block contains stretchaction.
Clickon the light blue grip of the dynamic blockto highlight the selected grip.
Command line prompt appears, do either of the following:
Specify "B(Base point)" option to locate the base point for stretching.
Specify "U(Undo)" option to abort the last stretch.
Specify "X(eXit)" option to exit stretch manipulation.
Specify target location for grip directly.

step.info: After specifying the target location, the selected dynamic blockwill be stretched.
